zh: 信驊科技首度發布企業社會責任報告書，倡議永續管理

信驊科技今日(29日)發布2020年企業社會責任報告書，涵蓋公司治理、環境、社會三大面向企業議題的承諾與行動，向社會大眾闡述信驊科技在永續管理面的實踐。此外，亦積極接軌國際ESG趨勢，近期內將發布首本ESG摘要，透明且清楚揭露包括環境保護(Environment)、社會責任(Social)、公司治理(Governance)等相關議題，以實際行動落實，讓利害關係人更能瞭解信驊科技於ESG各個面向的運作。

信驊科技董事長林鴻明先生表示: 「2019年底我們喜迎信驊科技第十五週年，這是我們相當重要的里程碑。長久以來專注於本業高成長的同時，我們也體認到企業永續發展重要性，因此首次發行2020年度企業社會責任報告書，落實永續管理並積極履行企業社會責任｣。本次信驊科技委請勤業眾信風險管理諮詢部門協助，依循全球報告倡議組織(Global Reporting Initiative) GRI永續性報導原則進行報告書撰寫，具體說明信驊科技永續相關作為及成效。

環境氣候方面，信驊科技無製造工廠，因此承諾透過積極發揮晶片研發能力聚焦綠色設計，在產品研發上為綠色節能省電做出貢獻，成為客戶能源效益最佳化夥伴。以信驊科技最新一代遠端伺服器管理晶片AST2600與前一代產品AST2500相比，平均單顆晶片一年可節省高達61.34%的用電量即能達成同樣之工作負載；未來信驊將繼續投注資源強化公司研發，在提供先進技術同時，發揮技術核心優勢，為全球半導體低碳供應鏈努力。公司治理方面，秉持營運透明並強化員工福利與人才管理，積極爭取攬才與留才。信驊科技於2020年所公布之上市櫃公司非主管職平均年薪名列第十位，平均離職率4.30%，遠低於科技業界離職率。社會投入方面，信驊科技自2013年開始致力於支持弱勢偏鄉教育，近年來則朝向公益投入結合企業核心發展，自2020年起以「協助高等教育，強化青年學子培育」為中長期企業社會責任目標，並且就近選定國立陽明交通大學以及國立清華大學，逐步針對年輕學子進行一連串教育資源投入，包含青年教授贊助計畫，協助大學留任優秀人才等。
信驊科技於2021年8月成立永續管理委員會，宣示公司持續推動企業永續發展的目標，將以技術核心優勢、綠色節能產品為全球永續發展而努力，在兼顧營運獲利的同時，積極的面對企業永續管理以及落實社會回饋。未來也將依循「公司治理3.0 永續發展藍圖」強化管理；朝國際氣候
相關財務揭露規範（TCFD）與永續會計準則理事會（SASB）等國際規範以及報告書第三方認證等方向揭露永續成果。

信驊科技為一家卓越的Fabless無晶圓廠IC設計公司，同時也是市場中頂尖SoC （System on Chip）系統解決方案的領導者與創始者，成立於2004年。作為全球第一大遠端伺服器管理晶片供應商，信驊科技致力於研發自主創新技術、快速反應客戶需求，其研發領域涵蓋：遠端伺服器管理晶片（Baseboard Management Controller SoC，BMC SoC）、PC /AV影音延伸晶片（PC/AV Extension SoC）、及最新的Cupola360 多影像處理專用晶片（Cupola360 Multi-Image Stitching Processing SoC）。繼2014年與2015年後，信驊科技再次於2018年至2020年連續三年榮獲富比士雜誌（Forbes）評選為亞太地區200大最佳中小企業（Asia's 200 Best Under a Billion），是客戶值得信賴的合作夥伴。2016年宣佈併購博通旗下Emulex Pilot™伺服器遠端系統管理晶片事業，並於2018年正式推出Cupola360 多影像處理專用晶片暨軟體解決方案，將產品線擴及影像相關領域。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站：www.aspeedtech.com。Cupola360產品相關訊息，請參訪Cupola360官方網站: www.Cupola360.com。
en: ASPEED Technology’s First Release of Sustainability Report to Advocate Sustainable Management

Today (Sep. 29th), ASPEED Technology released 2020 Sustainability Report to cover the three aspects of governance, environment, and social responsibility pledges and actions to the public. Meanwhile, ASPEED Technology will follow the international ESG trend actively and release the first ESG summary shortly. Through open and transparent information disclosures, it shows members of the general public and stakeholders the hard work and achievements of ASPEED Technology in the area of ESG, including Environment, Social, and Governance.

Chairman Chris Lin stated, “ In 2019, we celebrated ASPEED Technology’s 15th anniversary, an important milestone for us. While focusing on the high growth of the industry for a long time, we realize the significance of sustainable development. The 2020 Sustainability Report hence was initially issued for implementing sustainable management and accomplishing corporate social responsibility.” ASPEED Technology has requested the assistance of Deloitte Risk Advisory to compose a standard report according to GRI sustainability principles of Global Reporting Initiative to specify the sustainability operations and contributions to stakeholders.

In the aspect of Environment, we aim to leverage the Company’s core IC design capabilities and use green design capabilities to make products that save energy and support the creation of a low carbon supply chain. In product application, on average over the course of a year our 7th generation AST2600 BMC SoC can achieve the same work output as the 6th generation AST2500 model with 61.34% lower energy consumption. For Corporate Governance, we insist on operational transparency and emphasize upholding the rights and interests of employees, shareholders, and stakeholders. In 2020, ASPEED Technology ranked 10th among firms listed on the TWSE for average salary of non-management employees. In the future we will continue to pay attention toward employee welfare and talent management. For Social Investment, ASPEED Technology’s efforts to blend public welfare with our core business led us to turn “helping higher education institutions strengthen cultivation of young scholars” into a mid-to-long-term CSR objective. In 2020, we selected two neighboring universities, National Chiao Tung University and National Tsing Hua University, as partners for providing educational resources.
In 2021 ASPEED Technology establishes a Sustainability Committee that will support greater participation in corporate governance, environmental, and social issues. Looking to the future, ASPEED

Technology will follow the principles of Corporate Governance Roadmap 3.0, and the international standards of Task Force on Climate-related Financial Disclosures (TCFD), as well as the Sustainability Accounting Standards Board (SASB) to strengthen the sustainability management.

ASPEED Technology Inc. is a highly innovative fabless IC-design company founded in 2004 and headquartered in Hsinchu Science Park, Taiwan. As a pioneer and leader of cutting-edge SoC system solutions with a focus on the niche markets of high-margin products, the company's specialties range from Server Management SoC solution, PC/AV extension solution, to the latest Cupola360 multi-image stitching image processor.

ASPEED has been dedicated to developing innovative technologies in order to quickly respond to customer needs, which has made the company a leading provider of innovative SoC system solutions as well as a reliable business partner. ASPEED is currently the world's No. 1 BMC (Baseboard Management Controller) chip provider, and has been honored as one of "Forbes Asia's 200 Best Under a Billion" companies in 2014, 2015, and 2018 to 2020. In 2016, ASPEED acquired Broadcom's Emulex Pilot™ remote server management chip business. For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at www.aspeedtech.com and Cupola360.com
